ygData.subject: Re: Everquest Information
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually I have no much idea on it except that u wouldn t died from stavation. It s just that u don t heal naturally with time. And also in the Desert
ygData.messageBody:
At 06:48 PM 4/30/99 +0800, Entreri wrote:
> Can anyone xplain how the food system works? Entreri Email:

Actually I have no much idea on it except that u wouldn't died from
stavation. It's just that u don't heal naturally with time. And also in the
Desert region, u consume water at a much faster rate.
